name: EVA Hot Melt Adhesive
description: Excellent bonding strength for packaging applications with fast setting time and superior adhesion to various substrates.
fullDescription: EVA (Ethylene Vinyl Acetate) Hot Melt Adhesive offers outstanding performance in high-speed packaging lines. This thermoplastic adhesive provides excellent initial tack, fast setting speed, and strong bond strength across a wide temperature range. Ideal for carton sealing, case and tray forming, and general packaging applications.

name: Pressure Sensitive Adhesive
description: FDA compliant adhesive for food packaging with excellent tack and peel strength.
fullDescription: Premium pressure sensitive adhesive designed specifically for food contact applications. Meets FDA 21 CFR 175.105 requirements for indirect food contact. Provides permanent bonding with excellent resistance to moisture and temperature variations.

name: Alkyd Resin - Short Oil
description: Superior gloss and flexibility for industrial coatings with excellent drying properties.
fullDescription: Short oil alkyd resin optimized for industrial coating applications. Provides excellent gloss retention, fast drying times, and superior hardness. Ideal for metal decorative coatings, automotive primers, and general industrial finishes.

name: Polyester Resin
description: Excellent chemical and weather resistance for powder coatings and liquid finishes.
fullDescription: High-performance saturated polyester resin designed for demanding coating applications. Offers outstanding chemical resistance, weather durability, and mechanical properties. Perfect for powder coatings, coil coatings, and high-durability architectural finishes.

name: Titanium Dioxide Pigment
description: High opacity white pigment for paints and coatings with excellent hiding power.
fullDescription: Premium grade rutile titanium dioxide pigment offering superior opacity, brightness, and tinting strength. Treated for optimal dispersion and durability in various coating systems. Industry-standard choice for architectural and industrial paints.

name: Iron Oxide Red
description: Excellent color strength and light stability for plastics and coatings applications.
fullDescription: Synthetic iron oxide red pigment with excellent heat stability and color consistency. Ideal for coloring plastics, rubber, and construction materials. Offers outstanding weather resistance and chemical inertness.

name: Packaging Grade Hot Melt
description: Fast setting adhesive for high-speed lines with excellent substrate adhesion.
fullDescription: Specifically formulated for high-speed packaging operations. This hot melt adhesive provides instant grab, fast set time, and reliable performance across various substrates including corrugated, paperboard, and plastics.

name: Acrylic Resin Solution
description: Good adhesion and clarity for decorative coatings with UV resistance.
fullDescription: Thermoplastic acrylic resin solution providing excellent clarity, adhesion, and UV resistance. Ideal for automotive clear coats, wood finishes, and decorative applications requiring high gloss and durability.

name: Carbon Black Pigment
description: High tinting strength for plastics and coatings with excellent UV protection.
fullDescription: High-performance carbon black pigment offering superior jetness, tinting strength, and UV protection. Essential for automotive plastics, cables, and outdoor applications requiring weather resistance.

name: Label Adhesive PSA
description: Permanent adhesive for labels and tapes with excellent aging resistance.
fullDescription: Pressure sensitive adhesive specifically designed for label applications. Provides permanent bonding with excellent aging resistance and performance across various label stocks and application temperatures.

name: Epoxy Resin
description: Excellent adhesion for industrial applications with superior chemical resistance.
fullDescription: Two-component epoxy resin system offering exceptional adhesion, chemical resistance, and mechanical properties. Ideal for industrial floor coatings, protective coatings, and high-performance applications.

name: Phthalocyanine Blue
description: Brilliant blue pigment with excellent fastness properties and color strength.
fullDescription: Organic blue pigment offering brilliant shade, high tinting strength, and excellent light and weather fastness. Widely used in automotive coatings, printing inks, and plastics coloration.
